com.xmlmind.ditac.util

Class Resolve

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xmlmind.ditac.util.Resolve

  • public final class Resolve
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class making it easy to use CatalogResolvers.

    This class is as thread-safe as the CatalogResolvers it creates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.xml.sax.EntityResolver createEntityResolver()
      Returns a properly configured, ready to use, EntityResolver.

      Returns a properly configured, ready to use, CatalogResolver.

      Resolves specified URI.

    • Method Detail

      • setResolverFactory

        public static void setResolverFactory(ResolverFactory factory)
        Specify which ResolverFactory to use. By default, it is a instance of ResolverFactoryImpl.
        See Also:
        getResolverFactory()

      • getResolverFactory

        public static ResolverFactory getResolverFactory()
        Returns the ResolverFactory used by this helper class.
        See Also:
        setResolverFactory(com.xmlmind.ditac.util.ResolverFactory)

      • getCatalogResolver

        public static org.apache.xml.resolver.tools.CatalogResolver getCatalogResolver()
        Returns a properly configured, ready to use, CatalogResolver.

      • createEntityResolver

        public static org.xml.sax.EntityResolver createEntityResolver()
        Returns a properly configured, ready to use, EntityResolver.

        Simply invokes getCatalogResolver().

      • createURIResolver

        public static javax.xml.transform.URIResolver createURIResolver()
        Returns a properly configured, ready to use, URIResolver.

        Simply invokes getCatalogResolver().

      • resolveURI

        public static java.net.URL resolveURI(java.lang.String uri,
                                      java.net.URL baseURL)
                               throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Resolves specified URI. If a mapping is found in XML catalogs, this mapping is returned. Otherwise specified URI is parsed as an URL (if relative, it is resolved against specified base) and this URL is returned.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI for which a mapping is to be found. This URI may have a fragment.
        baseURL - base URL used if uri needs to be parsed as an URL. May be null.
        Returns:
        resolved URL
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException - if specified URI needs to be parsed as an URL but is malformed

      • resolveURI

        public static java.lang.String resolveURI(java.lang.String uri)
        Resolves specified URI. If a mapping is found in XML catalogs, this mapping is returned. Otherwise returns null.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI for which a mapping is to be found. This URI may have a fragment.
        Returns:
        found mapping or null
